"""Pyhole Utils Unit Tests"""

from __future__ import with_statement

import os
import sys
import unittest

from pyhole import utils



[docs]class TestUtils(unittest.TestCase):

[docs]    def setUp(self):
        utils.write_file("tests", "pyhole_test_file", "foo")
        self.new_file = utils.get_home_directory() + "tests/pyhole_test_file"



[docs]    def tearDown(self):
        os.unlink(self.new_file)
        os.rmdir(self.new_file[:-16])



[docs]    def test_logger(self):
        test_log_dir = "/tmp/pyhole_log_test"
        log = utils.logger("TEST", test_log_dir, True)
        self.assertEqual("TEST", log.name)
        self.assertEqual(log.level, 0)
        os.unlink(test_log_dir + "/test.log")
        os.rmdir(test_log_dir)



[docs]    def test_decode_entities(self):
        test_str = "<foo>bar</foo>"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "bar")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_2(self):
        test_str = "foo&nbsp;bar"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "foo bar")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_3(self):
        test_str = "&amp;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "&")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_4(self):
        test_str = "&quot;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "\"")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_5(self):
        test_str = "&#8212;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "-")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_6(self):
        test_str = "&#8217;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "'")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_7(self):
        test_str = "&#8220;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "\"")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_8(self):
        test_str = "&#8221;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "\"")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_9(self):
        test_str = "&#8230;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "...")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_10(self):
        test_str = "<[lol^>"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_11(self):
        test_str = "<]*?>"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_12(self):
        test_str = "&#39;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "'")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_13(self):
        test_str = "&#x22;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "\"")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_14(self):
        test_str = "&#x27;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "'")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_15(self):
        test_str = "&#x26;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "&")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_16(self):
        test_str = "&ndash;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "-")



[docs]    def test_decode_entities_17(self):
        test_str = "&#64;"
        self.assertEqual(utils.decode_entities(test_str), "@")



[docs]    def test_ensure_int(self):
        self.assertEqual(utils.ensure_int("3"), 3)



[docs]    def test_ensure_int_2(self):
        self.assertEqual(utils.ensure_int("\W"), None)



[docs]    def test_ensure_int_3(self):
        self.assertEqual(utils.ensure_int("a"), None)



[docs]    def test_load_config(self):
        test_config = utils.load_config("Pyhole", "../pyhole.conf.example")
        self.assertTrue(isinstance(test_config, object))



[docs]    def test_version(self):
        git_path = os.path.normpath(os.path.join(os.path.abspath(
                sys.argv[0]), os.pardir, os.pardir, ".git/refs/heads/master"))

        with open(git_path, "r") as git:
            git_commit = git.read()
        git.closed

        test_ver = "pyhole v0 (%s) - http://pyhole.org" % git_commit[0:5]
        self.assertEqual(utils.version("0"), test_ver)



[docs]    def test_get_home_directory(self):
        self.assertTrue(utils.get_home_directory().endswith("/.pyhole/"))



[docs]    def test_get_directory(self):
        new_dir = utils.get_home_directory() + "test_dir"
        self.assertFalse(os.path.exists(new_dir))
        utils.get_directory("test_dir")
        self.assertTrue(os.path.exists(new_dir))
        os.rmdir(new_dir)



[docs]    def test_write_file(self):
        self.assertTrue(os.path.exists(self.new_file))



[docs]    def test_read_file(self):
        self.assertEquals(utils.read_file("tests", "pyhole_test_file"), "foo")
